Author: dan.#2473
Content: @ca333 google is rough with banning apps. ive been through the whole rigamole of copyright infringing on google play, as many others. I would take out the pictures of rick and morty on the listing. if you search for rick and morty in the store they are definitely DMCAing apps using their IPs due to the lack of older rick and morty apps. at the very least i would make sure to not mention in the description where to get rick and morty coins for example.

Author: dan.#2473
Content: the pictures are less likely to cause an issue but i would still remove them

Author: Acura#2748
Content: A user is asking about kyc on atomicdex?

Author: ca333#0118
Content: Thanks @dan. - will remove these just to make sure to not run into issues. jfyi - We were told that since we do not sell anything with Rick and Morty (not assigning value to these tokens) nor profit from it in any way (app is free) it wouldn't be a problem due to the fact that fan-projects are allowed. (Apple for instance has also reviewed this application).

Author: ca333#0118
Content: We do not collect any KYC data - if courts contact us we would have to inform them about the technical architecture of a DEX system. The above paragraph is just a legal requirement in the application itself @Acura - dont worry, DEX doesn't have KYC.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: swap speed depends a lot on how fast block times are. KMD to smartchains with 1 min blocktimes will be much quicker than swaping for something with a 10 min blocktime. If blocks are slower than normal, it takes longer still.

Author: Novo#3073
Content: Here too, the app hangs..  Stuck in 'Connecting...' .   Tried Settings > Log Out.  Retried opening the app, got stuck at decrypting wallet.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: What phone model do you have? Could you please try to reinstall the application?

Author: Novo#3073
Content: I just figured it out.

Author: Novo#3073
Content: This happens when you have PIN disabled.  If you have it disabled and you come back to the app it hangs.

Author: Novo#3073
Content: Additionally, 'Biometric protection' on it's own does not work.  The user needs to have the PIN toggle activated as well in order for the biometric protection to work.   Yet it is possible to toggle 'biometric' on it's own.  That should also be fixed.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Thank you for report! Yes, this clue with biometric protection is know one and will be improved in the next patch

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Will try to reproduce issue with disabled pin + hang on my side

Author: Novo#3073
Content: Additionally.  When the user selects 'Change Pin', the label should state 'Enter your old PIN code'  and the next screen should state'Enter your new PIN Code'.  Make sure the 'old' and 'new' adjectives are bolded for emphasis.

Author: Novo#3073
Content: Okay good to hear.
